channel.title: Endserver help
channel.description:
Hey guys, i need help with my endserver. I made one and edited it and this is wat i have [code]@echo off tskill java /a pause [/code] I tried alot of codes and they open for a second and close fast and nothing closes. But with this code it stays open but i got an error
[code]'tskill' is not recongnized as an internal or external command,operable program or batch file...[/code]
Cans ome1 help me to get the restarter to work. Thanks[br][size=1]Posted on: January 20, 2007, 02:37:12 PM[/size][hr]Hello pls help![br][size=1]Posted on: January 20, 2007, 11:17:50 PM[/size][hr]duz anyone know...

item.title: Endserver help
item.dc:creator: @Danny15 Danny15
item.description:
@Danny15 wrote:

…
ok…

im trying to get my endserver to end runserver.bat every 30 min so i can restart the server with my autorestarter and set sheduled tasks which i know how to do. I just need help witht the end server

Read full topic

item.title: Endserver help
item.dc:creator: @Enum Enum
item.description:
@Enum wrote:

tskill isn’t a batch command. If you wan’t to run it do this:

@echo off
java client
pause

You were also very vague, in the future please explain what you wan’t to achieve and the error you got whilst trying to achieve it.

Read full topic
